headline: Charles River Introduces Global Biotech Incubator Program
summary: WILMINGTON, Mass., December 05, 2024--Charles River Laboratories International, Inc. (NYSE: CRL) today announced the launch of the Charles River Incubator Program (CIP), specializing in supporting early-stage biotechnology companies in the discovery, development and phase-appropriate manufacturing of advanced therapies.
